name: Sample_Resume_DataAnalyst.pdf
resume_text:
ALEX JOHNSON
Data Analyst
Professional Summary
Detail-oriented Data Analyst with 3+ years of experience in interpreting and analyzing data to drive
successful business solutions. Proficient in SQL, Python, and data visualization tools like Tableau
and Power BI.
Skills
SQL, Python, Tableau, Power BI, Excel, Data Cleaning, Statistics, Machine Learning
Experience
Data Analyst - Tech Solutions Inc. (Jan 2022 - Present)
- Analyzed sales data to identify trends and improved forecasting accuracy by 20%.
- Developed interactive dashboards in Tableau to track key performance indicators.
- Automated data pipelines using Python and SQL, reducing manual reporting by 40%.
Junior Data Analyst - Market Insights Co. (Aug 2019 - Dec 2021)
- Cleaned and transformed raw datasets to support business intelligence initiatives.
- Generated weekly reports to track campaign performance and audience engagement.
Projects
- Customer Churn Prediction using Machine Learning (Random Forest, Logistic Regression)
- Retail Sales Dashboard in Tableau for KPI monitoring
Education
B.Sc. in Statistics, University of California, 2019
